title: anbu valaiyinilE
sahitya:
anbu valaiyinilE aghappaTTEn Arumukha vElAvA murugA murugA murugA un


anupallavi

  tunbam tuDaittaruLum duraiyE un peyarinai shollum  vAi ellAm sarkkaraiyE en appanE


caraNam    muttu mukhattirk-kANum mullai sirippinilE mOham koNDEn ayyanE
shakti vErk-karattAl nI tAvi ennai aNaiya dAham koNDEn meyyanE
bhakti shei aDiyavar pAsha vinaiyai shuDum shuddha shivak-kanalE
pittu piDitteppOdum pidaTruginrEn ayyA un periya karuNai pera uriyavanena nambi
